types:type.name: outputmetadata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type outputmetadata = {| orderID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, placementDate: String, customerId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, status: String, totalPrice: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderItem: Array<{| itemId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, itemName: String, price: Number {"typeId": "double"}, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"orderID\\\":1,\\\"placementDate\\\":\\\"2019-12-12\\\",\\\"customerId\\\":1,\\\"status\\\":\\\"created\\\",\\\"totalPrice\\\":92,\\\"orderItem\\\":[{\\\"itemId\\\":1,\\\"itemName\\\":\\\"testItem\\\",\\\"price\\\":23.00,\\\"quantity\\\":4}]}"}

types:type.name: systemorderarray
